sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_8d4370089f2432107f4460e2b824ab46
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves delivery delay record details including route options and problem description</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Lookup Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 17:16:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8d4370089f2432107f4460e2b824ab46</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lookup Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_8d4370089f2432107f4460e2b824ab46</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 18:19:05</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_b9ced1809fe832107f4460e2b824ab24
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates delivery delay record using custom script</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"The delivery route identifier"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"JSON formatted financial analysis for all route options"},{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"System ID of the created incident record"},{"name":"status","description":"Updated workflow status (should be calculated)"}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Script</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    try {
        // Get inputs
        var routeId = inputs.route_id;
        var calculatedImpact = inputs.calculated_impact;
        var incidentSysId = inputs.incident_sys_id;
        var status = inputs.status || 'calculated';
        
        // Log what we're doing
        gs.info("========================================");
        gs.info("Update Delivery Delay Script Starting");
        gs.info("Route ID: " + routeId);
        gs.info("Status to set: " + status);
        gs.info("========================================");
        
        // Validate inputs
        if (!routeId) {
            gs.error("ERROR: route_id is missing");
            return {
                "status": "error",
                "message": "route_id is required"
            };
        }
        
        // Find the record by route_id
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
        gr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
        gr.query();
        
        if (gr.next()) {
            gs.info("Found delivery delay record with route_id: " + routeId);
            
            // Update the record
            if (calculatedImpact) {
                gr.setValue('calculated_impact', calculatedImpact);
                gs.info("Set calculated_impact");
            }
            
            if (incidentSysId) {
                gr.setValue('incident_sys_id', incidentSysId);
                gs.info("Set incident_sys_id: " + incidentSysId);
            }
            
            if (status) {
                gr.setValue('status', status);
                gs.info("Set status: " + status);
            }
            
            // Perform the update
            gr.update();
            
            gs.info("Successfully updated delivery delay route " + routeId);
            gs.info("========================================");
            
            return {
                "status": "success",
                "message": "Successfully updated delivery delay " + routeId,
                "route_id": routeId,
                "updated_status": status
            };
            
        } else {
            gs.error("Could not find delivery delay record with route_id: " + routeId);
            gs.error("========================================");
            
            return {
                "status": "error",
                "message": "Could not find delivery delay with route_id " + routeId,
                "route_id": routeId
            };
        }
        
    } catch(error) {
        gs.error("========================================");
        gs.error("Exception in Update Delivery Delay Script");
        gs.error("Error: " + error.toString());
        gs.error("Stack: " + error.stack);
        gs.error("========================================");
        
        return {
            "status": "error",
            "message": "Exception occurred: " + error.toString(),
            "error_details": error.stack
        };
    }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:26:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>b9ced1809fe832107f4460e2b824ab24</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_b9ced1809fe832107f4460e2b824ab24</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:37</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_b752e54c9fe832107f4460e2b824abe8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates delivery delay with chosen route and status changes</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route identifier"},{"name":"chosen_option","description":"Selected optimal route as JSON"},{"name":"status","description":"Updated workflow status"}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    try {
        var routeId = inputs.route_id;
        var chosenOption = inputs.chosen_option;
        var status = inputs.status || 'approved';
        
        gs.info("Updating route " + routeId + " with chosen option");
        
        if (!routeId) {
            return {"status": "error", "message": "route_id required"};
        }
        
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
        gr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
        gr.query();
        
        if (gr.next()) {
            if (chosenOption) {
                gr.setValue('chosen_option', chosenOption);
            }
            if (status) {
                gr.setValue('status', status);
            }
            gr.update();
            
            return {
                "status": "success",
                "message": "Updated route " + routeId,
                "route_id": routeId
            };
        } else {
            return {"status": "error", "message": "Route not found"};
        }
    } catch(error) {
        return {"status": "error", "message": error.toString()};
    }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:42:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>b752e54c9fe832107f4460e2b824abe8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_b752e54c9fe832107f4460e2b824abe8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:42:20</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_814338cc9f2432107f4460e2b824ab4a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves customer contract details including delivery window and penalty rates</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Lookup Supply Agreement</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 17:16:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>814338cc9f2432107f4460e2b824ab4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lookup Supply Agreement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_814338cc9f2432107f4460e2b824ab4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 18:19:05</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_ff52294c9fe832107f4460e2b824ab25
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Sends routing decision to n8n for external system coordination</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route identifier"},{"name":"truck_id","description":"Truck identifier"},{"name":"chosen_option","description":"Selected optimal route as JSON"}]</input_schema><name>Trigger n8n Workflow</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    var webhookURL = "https://pepsico-route-execute.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/pepsico-routing";
    
    try {
        var routeId = inputs.route_id;
        var truckId = inputs.truck_id;
        var chosenOption = inputs.chosen_option;
        
        gs.info("Triggering n8n webhook for route " + routeId);
        
        if (!routeId || !truckId) {
            return {"status": "error", "message": "Missing required fields"};
        }
        
        var chosenOptionObj;
        if (typeof chosenOption === 'string') {
            try {
                chosenOptionObj = JSON.parse(chosenOption);
            } catch(e) {
                gs.error("Failed to parse chosen_option: " + e);
                return {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid JSON in chosen_option"};
            }
        } else {
            chosenOptionObj = chosenOption;
        }
        
        var payload = {
            "route_id": routeId.toString(),
            "truck_id": truckId.toString(),
            "chosen_option": chosenOptionObj
        };
        
        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        request.setEndpoint(webhookURL);
        request.setHttpMethod('POST');
        request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        request.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(payload));
        request.setHttpTimeout(30000);
        
        var response = request.execute();
        var statusCode = response.getStatusCode();
        
        gs.info("Webhook response: " + statusCode);
        
        if (statusCode == 200 || statusCode == 201 || statusCode == 202) {
            return {
                "status": "success",
                "message": "n8n workflow triggered",
                "response_code": statusCode
            };
        } else {
            return {
                "status": "warning",
                "message": "Non-200 response",
                "response_code": statusCode
            };
        }
    } catch(error) {
        gs.error("Webhook error: " + error);
        return {"status": "error", "message": error.toString()};
    }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:42:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ff52294c9fe832107f4460e2b824ab25</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger n8n Workflow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ff52294c9fe832107f4460e2b824ab25</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:42:20</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_a19109009fe432107f4460e2b824abb0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates delivery delay record with financial calculations and status changes</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Identifies which delivery delay record to update"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"JSON formatted financial analysis for all route options"},{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"System ID of the created incident record"},{"name":"status","description":"Updated workflow status (should be 'calculated')"},{"name":"sys_id","description":"System ID of the delivery delay record to update"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 18:19:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a19109009fe432107f4460e2b824abb0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a19109009fe432107f4460e2b824abb0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:00:14</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_a0ddac409f2432107f4460e2b824aba8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyzes financial impact of delivery disruptions and creates incident tracking</description><instructions>You are a financial analysis agent for PepsiCo supply chain operations. Your job is to:
1. When a delivery delay record has status "pending", use the Look Up Delivery Delay tool to retrieve the delivery delay details. The lookup will return a record with a sys_id field - store this sys_id value, you will need it in step 5.
2. Look up the customer contract from Supply Agreement table using the customer_id from the delivery delay.
3. For each proposed route option in the proposed_routes field, calculate: - Delivery time in hours = eta_minutes / 60 - Hours over contract = Delivery time - deliver_window_hours (if negative, use 0) - Penalty cost = Hours over contract × stockout_penalty_rate
4. Create an incident record using the Create Incident tool with: - short_description: Include truck_id and route_id - description: All breakdown details, customer information, and the financial analysis you calculated showing all route options with their penalty costs
5. Update the delivery delay record using the Update Delivery Delay tool. You MUST provide these inputs: - sys_id: Use the EXACT sys_id value that was returned in step 1 from the Look Up Delivery Delay tool - calculated_impact: Your JSON formatted financial analysis with all route calculations - incident_sys_id: The sys_id that was returned from the Create Incident tool in step 4 - status: Set this to the string "calculated"
Be precise with calculations and format all data as structured JSON. The sys_id from step 1 is critical - make sure you extract it from the lookup response and pass it to the update tool.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The Route Financial Analysis Agent for PepsiCo Deliveries specializes in analyzing the financial implications of delivery delays. The agent is adept at calculating the financial impact of delays, including penalty costs, and providing detailed financial analysis to support decision-making in the supply chain operations. - The agent can retrieve delivery delay records using the 'Lookup Delivery Delay' tool. This capability enables the agent to gather necessary details such as route options, truck ID, and customer ID, which are foundational for conducting further financial analysis. - The agent can access customer contract details using the 'Lookup Supply Agreement' tool. This capability allows the agent to obtain information on delivery windows and stockout penalty rates, which are essential for calculating penalties associated with delivery delays. - The agent is capable of calculating the delivery time, hours over contract, and penalty costs for each proposed route option. This involves precise calculations using data from delivery delay records and supply agreements to determine the financial impact of delays. - The agent can create incident records using the 'Create Incident' tool. This capability allows the agent to document the financial analysis, including breakdown details and penalty costs, ensuring that the information is available for further action and decision-making. - The agent can update delivery delay records using the 'Update Delivery Delay Script' tool. This capability ensures that the financial analysis and incident details are accurately recorded in the system, updating the status to 'calculated' and maintaining the integrity of the workflow.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are the Route Financial Analysis Agent for PepsiCo Deliveries and you excel looking up records and calculating financial impacts of delivery delays.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 16:57:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a0ddac409f2432107f4460e2b824aba8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_a0ddac409f2432107f4460e2b824aba8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:46</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_3752e54c9fe832107f4460e2b824abee
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates incident priority based on financial severity</description><input_schema>[{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"System ID of incident to update"},{"name":"priority","description":"Incident priority (1=Critical, 2=High, 3=Moderate)"}]</input_schema><name>Update Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    try {
        var incidentSysId = inputs.incident_sys_id;
        var priority = inputs.priority || 3;
        
        gs.info("Updating incident " + incidentSysId + " with priority " + priority);
        
        if (!incidentSysId) {
            return {"status": "error", "message": "incident_sys_id required"};
        }
        
        var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', incidentSysId);
        gr.query();
        
        if (gr.next()) {
            gr.setValue('priority', priority);
            gr.update();
            
            return {
                "status": "success",
                "message": "Updated incident priority to " + priority,
                "incident_sys_id": incidentSysId
            };
        } else {
            return {"status": "error", "message": "Incident not found"};
        }
    } catch(error) {
        return {"status": "error", "message": error.toString()};
    }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:42:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3752e54c9fe832107f4460e2b824abee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_3752e54c9fe832107f4460e2b824abee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:42:20</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_a19109009fe432107f4460e2b824abaa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Creates incident record with breakdown details and financial analysis</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 18:19:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a19109009fe432107f4460e2b824abaa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a19109009fe432107f4460e2b824abaa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 18:19:05</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_74d105409fe432107f4460e2b824ab3c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Selects optimal routes and coordinates external execution</description><instructions>You are a route optimization agent for PepsiCo supply chain operations. Your job is to:
1. Retrieve the delivery delay record with status "calculated" 2. Parse the calculated_impact JSON to find all route options with their penalty costs 3. Select the route option with the LOWEST penalty cost 4. Update the incident priority based on financial impact: - If penalty > $500: Priority 1 (Critical) - If penalty $200-$500: Priority 2 (High) - If penalty < $200: Priority 3 (Moderate) 5. Store the chosen route in the chosen_option field as JSON 6. Call the webhook to trigger n8n workflow with the routing decision 7. Update the delivery delay status to "approved"
Always choose the most cost-effective route.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is an expert in logistics and route optimization, specifically for PepsiCo's supply chain operations. It is capable of analyzing various route options and selecting the most cost-effective one to minimize penalty costs. - The agent can retrieve delivery delay records with a status of 'calculated' to assess the current logistics situation and identify potential areas for route optimization. - The agent can parse the calculated_impact JSON to extract and evaluate all available route options along with their associated penalty costs. - The agent is capable of selecting the route option with the lowest penalty cost, ensuring the most cost-effective logistics solution for PepsiCo. - The agent can update the incident priority based on the financial impact of the penalty costs, categorizing them into Priority 1 (Critical), Priority 2 (High), or Priority 3 (Moderate). - The agent can store the chosen route in the chosen_option field as JSON, maintaining a clear record of the decision made for route optimization. - The agent can call the webhook to trigger the n8n workflow with the routing decision, facilitating coordination with external systems for seamless implementation. - The agent can update the delivery delay status to 'approved', signaling that the route optimization decision is finalized and ready for execution. - The agent can use the 'Trigger n8n Workflow' tool to send the routing decision to n8n for external system coordination, using inputs such as route_id, truck_id, and chosen_option. - The agent can use the 'Update Incident' tool to adjust the incident priority based on financial severity, using inputs such as incident_sys_id and priority. - The agent can use the 'Lookup Delivery Delay' tool to retrieve delivery delay records with calculated financial impacts, using predefined CRUD input variables. - The agent can use the 'Update Delivery Delay' tool to update the delivery delay record with the chosen route and status changes, using inputs such as route_id, chosen_option, and status.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are a route optimization agent for PepsiCo supply chain operations and you are an expert at logistics and finding the best routes with the lowest penalty costs.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 18:22:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>74d105409fe432107f4460e2b824ab3c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_74d105409fe432107f4460e2b824ab3c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:42:38</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_fb52edc49fe832107f4460e2b824ab9a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves delivery delay with calculated financial impacts</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Lookup Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:42:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fb52edc49fe832107f4460e2b824ab9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lookup Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">e5dfd0409fa032107f4460e2b824abc7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_fb52edc49fe832107f4460e2b824ab9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:42:19</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
